body:
Heey resepignev here,

I'd like to ask, if you can use custom style.css on your profile page?
It would be really cool, because you could style it more than just with html.

Well that's my question, but that's a discussion, so what are your thoughts about custom style.css on your profile?
body_tagged:
Heey resepignev here,

I'd like to ask, if you can use custom style.css on your profile page?
It would be really cool, because you could style it more than just with html.

Well that's my question, but that's a discussion, so what are your thoughts about custom style.css on your profile?
title: [Question] Custom style.css on profile

replies.body: No, Avicus profiles do not support custom CSS. It's for security reasons.
replies.body_tagged: No, Avicus profiles do not support custom CSS. It's for security reasons.

replies.body: It would be great, but as JKAwesome said, Avicus profiles don't support custom CSS!
replies.body_tagged: It would be great, but as JKAwesome said, Avicus profiles don't support custom CSS!

replies.body: Awww! It would be sooo kewl! Maybe it will be implemented at some point...
replies.body_tagged: Awww! It would be sooo kewl! Maybe it will be implemented at some point...
